system_messages.error_title: An error has occurred, please try again later
system_messages.error_desc: If this error persists, please contact @v3xi
system_messages.alert_message:
If you want to lock QuoteBot commands to certain channels/roles please use the Discord server settings at:
 **Your Server > Server Settings > Integrations > QuoteBot**

settings_main_menu.title: Server Settings
settings_main_menu.description:
-
Please select the settings you would like to edit

channel: Select the channels for channel specific messages
commands: Modify usage settings for certain quotebot commands
detection: Modify the filter settings for quotes added to QuoteBot
automod: Modify the AutoMod actions for QuoteBot

language_settings.title: Language Settings
language_settings.description:
-
Please select the language for QuoteBot messages

description.end:
-
Please choose what channels you would like certain QuoteBot messages to be sent too.

placeholders.added_quotes: Select a new channel for added quote messages
placeholders.logs: Select a new channel for log messages
placeholders.alerts: Select a new channel for alert messages

command_settings.title: Command Settings
command_settings.description:
-
Please select the command you would like to edit

add_settings.title: Add Command Settings
add_settings.description: Use the dropdown menus below to edit the add command settings.

cooldown_field.name: Command Cooldown:
cooldown_field.value: How long users have to wait before using the add command again

add_to_self_field.name: Self-Quote:
add_to_self_field.value: Can users add quotes to their own profile

delete_settings.title: Delete Command Settings
delete_settings.description: Use the dropdown menus below to edit the delete command settings.

cooldown_field.name: Command Cooldown:
cooldown_field.value: How long users have to wait before using the delete command again

delete_from_self_field.name: Delete Own:
delete_from_self_field.value:
Can users delete quotes from their own profile
__Independent of Added Only__

only_delete_added_field.name: Added Only:
only_delete_added_field.value: Can users only delete quotes they've added

cooldown.label: Cooldown
cooldown.placeholder: Set a cooldown for the add command

edit_settings.title: Edit Command Settings
edit_settings.description: Use the dropdown menus below to edit the edit command settings.

cooldown_field.name: Command Cooldown:
cooldown_field.value: How long users have to wait before using the edit command again

edit_timeout_field.name: Edit Timeout:
edit_timeout_field.value: How long until users can no longer edit a quote

only_edit_added_field.name: Added Only:
only_edit_added_field.value: Can users only edit quotes they've added

edit_timeout.label: Edit Timeout
edit_timeout.placeholder: Set a timeout time for the edit command

cooldown.label: Cooldown
cooldown.placeholder: Set a cooldown for the add command

profile_settings.title: Profile Command Settings
profile_settings.description: Use the dropdown menus below to edit the profile command settings.

force_hidden_profile_field.name: Force Hidden:
force_hidden_profile_field.value: Make the /profile command only viewable to the user who used it

lock_nsfw_profile_field.name: Lock NSFW:
lock_nsfw_profile_field.value: Prevent viewing the NSFW category on your server

filter_settings.inaccuracy_warning:
<:alert:994765426829561928> **QuoteBot will always block personal information & links from being added**

*While QuoteBot does its best to accurately filter, it is not 100% perfect and may sometimes fail to filter or filter incorrectly.* Use the **/review** command...wip
filter_settings.title: Filter Settings

preset_desc.Custom: *Custom filter settings to suite your server's needs (full list of filters in /help)*
preset_desc.Medium: *QuoteBot will detect excessive profanity, sexual content, slurs, and deragatory phrases*
preset_desc.Strict: *QuoteBot will detect all profanity, all sexual content, slurs, deragatory phrases, and threats*

description.end:
-
Use the dropdown menus below to either choose your preset filtering or select your custom filter needs

preset_dropdown.placeholder: Select a filter preset or customize your own

custom_dropdown.placeholder: Select what filters you want to use

h_profanity.label: Heavy Profanity
h_profanity.desc: Filter out excessive use of profanity

light_sexual_content.label: Light Sexual Content
light_sexual_content.desc: Filter out light sexual content or innuendos

sensitive.label: Sensitive
sensitive.desc: Filter out sensitive topics (drugs, violence, politics, etc.)

automod_settings.title: Auto Mod Settings
automod_settings.description:
-
Please select a detection to edit automod actions for
no_detections_enabled: <:alert:994765426829561928> **You're server does not have any filters enabled, please enable a filter to edit that filters automod action**

-
Press on the button below to go to the filter settings page

h_profanity.label: Heavy Profanity
h_profanity.desc: Filter out excessive use of profanity

light_sexual_content.label: Light Sexual Content
light_sexual_content.desc: Filter out light sexual content or innuendos

sensitive.label: Sensitive
sensitive.desc: Filter out sensitive topics (drugs, violence, politics, etc.)

description.end: Use the dropdown menus below to select actions

dropdown.placeholder: Select an action to apply to this detection

Notify.label: Notify
Notify.desc: Send notification to the alerts channel

Cancel.label: Cancel
Cancel.desc: Block the quote from being added
